content:
Hi

We are planning to upgrade Zulip form version 2.0 to 2.1.1. Is this upgrade smooth and how long is the downtime?

Thanks
Sazzad
@Mohammad Sazzad Hossain most folks have found the upgrade smooth. downtime depends on how much message history you have; some examples are documented in the Upgrade Notes.
@Tim Abbott thank you for the response. Anything needs to be taken care proactively to be on safe side?
